metaHeader.label: 217 rue du Faubourg Saint Honoré, 75008 Paris

footer.description: The story of the gallery begins with an ambition: to preserve and transmit ancestral craftsmanship while meeting the expectations of a demanding and international clientele. Since its inception, the company has collaborated with renowned designers to offer unique rugs, incorporating superior quality materials and contemporary style. Today, it continues to establish itself as a reference in the luxury rug industry, combining tradition, modernity, and ethical responsibility.

admin.title: Your Administrator Area
admin.description: This area is very functional. I have prepared two services for you: adding products and articles. Adding articles will help improve the site's SEO and allow users to find you over time with regular (and quality) posts. The products page will let you showcase your products and measure online sales traction. If a need is detected, it will be easy to add an online payment system.

slices.title: Our Commitment
slices.description: Franck Sabet accompanies you with passion in the sale, cleaning, and restoration of your rugs. We are committed to preserving their brilliance and authenticity through our unique expertise.

slices.title: Rug Restoration

data.title: Exceptional Rug Sales
data.description: Discover our collection of exceptional rugs.

data.title: Restoration
data.description: We bring your antique rugs back to life.

slices.title: Why Restore Your Rugs?
slices.description: Rug restoration is essential for preserving their beauty and value. Whether it's an antique or contemporary rug, our expertise guarantees meticulous and faithful repair to the original.

slices.title: Our Restoration Techniques
slices.description: We use artisanal techniques passed down through generations to repair damaged rugs. Our services include fringe replacement, patching, recoloring, and edge repairs.

slices.text: Each restored rug is a masterpiece that regains its original splendor.

services.title: Patching
services.description: Repairing holes and tears with traditional techniques.

services.title: Recoloring
services.description: Restoring colors to bring back their original vibrancy.

services.title: Fringe Repairs
services.description: Replacing or repairing fringes for a flawless finish.

slices.title: Why Trust Us?
slices.description: With decades of experience, our craftsmen master every detail of restoration. Each intervention is carried out with care to respect the authenticity and integrity of your rug.

testimonials.quote: My antique rug was restored to perfection. I'm impressed by the level of detail and care given.
testimonials.author: Pierre Lemoine

testimonials.quote: Thanks to the recoloring, my rug has regained its vibrant original colors. Thank you to the Franck Sabet team!
testimonials.author: Sophie Martin

testimonials.quote: The fringes of my rug were replaced with incredible precision. I am thrilled with the result!
testimonials.author: Jacques Dupuis

slices.title: Ready to Bring Your Rug Back to Life?

slices.paragraph: Don't wait any longer! Contact us today for a personalized diagnosis and a free quote.
By phone: (+33) 1 45 61 12 95 or visit our store: 217 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, Paris

slices.title: Professional Cleaning
slices.subtitle: Preserve the beauty and durability of your rugs

slices.title: Why Clean Your Rugs With Us?
slices.description: With years of experience, we use cleaning techniques tailored to the fibers and materials of your rugs. Our process ensures deep cleanliness while preserving their shine and structure.

slices.title: Modern and Traditional Techniques
slices.description: We combine traditional hand-cleaning techniques with modern innovations. Each rug is individually treated to ensure optimal results.

slices.paragraph: A well-maintained rug is essential for preserving its lifespan and shine. We offer custom cleaning services for every type of rug, whether antique, wool, or silk.
We use gentle, non-aggressive products to remove stains, dust, and allergens while preserving the quality of the fibers.

slices.text: Professional cleaning brings life back to your rugs and enhances your interior.

services.title: Deep Cleaning
services.description: Removing stubborn stains and allergens with proven techniques.

services.title: Regular Maintenance
services.description: Preserve your rugs' quality with periodic professional maintenance.

services.title: Delicate Cleaning
services.description: Tailored for silk or antique rugs that require special attention.

slices.title: Our Commitments
slices.description: We guarantee an environmentally friendly, effective cleaning service tailored to all types of rugs.

slices.title: A Five-Step Cleaning Process
slices.description: Our method combines manual expertise with modern tools to ensure deep cleaning. Each rug is carefully inspected, dusted, washed, and dried with precision to preserve its beauty and durability.

slices.paragraph: Entrust us with your rugs for professional and custom cleaning. Contact us today for an appointment or personalized advice.

slices.alt: Contact Franck Sabet - Luxury and Expertise
slices.title: We Are Here to Help
slices.subtitle: Need advice? Have a question? We are here to assist you.

slices.title: Our Commitment to You
slices.description: At Franck Sabet, every client is unique. Whether you need advice on choosing a rug, want to learn more about our services, or wish to schedule a cleaning or restoration appointment, our team is ready to assist you.

slices.title: A Customer Service That Listens
slices.description: Our team of experts is available to answer all your questions, whether by phone, email, or directly in-store. Share your needs with us, and we will find the perfect solution for you.

slices.title: Our Showroom is Open
slices.description: We would be delighted to welcome you to our Paris boutique, located in the prestigious Faubourg Saint-Honoré district. Come discover our collection of rugs and speak with our experts.

slices.paragraph: 217 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, 75008 Paris
Email: francksabet@yahoo.fr

slices.title: A Team of Passionate Experts
slices.description: At Franck Sabet, our mission is to provide you with personalized and high-quality service. Our experts are here to guide you every step of the way, whether it’s choosing the perfect rug for your home or restoring a valuable piece.

slices.title: Our Story
slices.description: For three generations, Franck Sabet has been preserving and passing on a unique heritage in the world of luxury rugs. Each piece is the result of exquisite craftsmanship, woven through centuries and cultures. Located in the heart of Paris, we collaborate with renowned designers and artisans to bring you exceptional rugs.

slices.title: Why Choose Us?
slices.description: At Franck Sabet, we combine age-old traditions with modern innovations to meet the expectations of a demanding clientele. Whether you're looking for a custom rug or advice on maintaining your pieces, we guarantee exceptional service.

slices.title: A Legacy Passed Down Through Generations
slices.content: Since its inception, the Franck Sabet house has stood out for its passion for quality craftsmanship. Our rugs, whether antique or contemporary, tell a unique story. We firmly believe that every detail, every fiber, deserves special attention to ensure a timeless masterpiece.

slices.text: Each rug tells a story, woven through time and cultures.

services.title: Expertise
services.description: Decades of experience in identifying and evaluating unique rugs.

services.title: Restoration
services.description: Restoration of antique and valuable rugs using traditional techniques.

services.title: Maintenance
services.description: Professional cleaning to preserve the brilliance and durability of your rugs.

slices.title: Our Heritage
slices.description: Each rug in our collection is a work of art. We collaborate with artisans and designers from around the world to bring you unique pieces made to last and elevate your interiors.

testimonials.quote: Impeccable service and rugs of exceptional quality. Highly recommend.

data.title: Rug Sales

slices.title: Why Trust Us?
slices.description: For two generations, our house has embodied excellence in the art of rugs. Each piece in our collection is meticulously selected for its refinement, elegance, and exceptional quality. Thanks to a rich family heritage and a deep love for craftsmanship, we combine tradition and modernity to offer our customers unique rugs, true works of art, that enhance the beauty of every interior. Each rug tells a story, woven through time and cultures.

slices.title: Our Heritage
slices.description: The Franck Sabet Gallery embodies a rich family history rooted in the world of luxury and artisanal craftsmanship. For thirty years, this business has been dedicated to creating and restoring high-end rugs. Located on the prestigious Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, the gallery is distinguished by its custom creations and high-precision restorations. Franck Sabet offers a wide range of hand-knotted contemporary rugs crafted from the finest Yak wool, sourced from regions like Nepal, Tibet, and India.

slices.paragraph: Welcome to Franck Sabet's website. By accessing this site, you agree to comply with these terms of use, which define the rules for using our online services.
The content of this site, including texts, images, and videos, is protected by intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized reproduction or use is prohibited.
The site is accessible to individuals of legal age and capable of entering into contracts under French law.
These GTS apply to all orders placed on our site. By validating an order, you unreservedly accept these terms of sale.
Prices are displayed in euros and include all applicable taxes. Delivery fees are indicated before the order is validated.
You can return products within 14 days of receipt, provided they are in perfect condition and in their original packaging.

To place an order, you must create an account by providing accurate information, such as your name, email address, and a secure password. Any incorrect or incomplete information may result in your account being suspended.
In case of lost or fraudulent use of your credentials, please contact our customer service to reset them.
Payments are secured using SSL encryption. We accept Visa, MasterCard, and American Express cards. Banking data is not stored on our servers.
Transactions are carried out via a secure payment platform. By using this platform, you agree to their terms of use.
Franck Sabet shall not be held liable for damages resulting from the use of this site or the purchase of products, unless otherwise provided by law.
We strive to keep the site accessible at all times, but interruptions may occur due to technical reasons or maintenance.
Your personal data is collected and used in accordance with our privacy policy. You have the right to access, modify, or delete your data at any time.
For any requests regarding your personal data, please contact us at: francksabet@yahoo.fr.
Franck Sabet shall not be held liable in case of force majeure, including but not limited to natural disasters, strikes, or interruptions in telecommunications networks.
For any questions or complaints, you can contact us by email at francksabet@yahoo.fr or by phone at (+33) 1 45 61 12 95.
Address: 217 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, 75008 Paris.
